snippet.title: Ruby: Huntress of Vale 2.0.0 Trailer!
snippet.description:
New trailer for upcoming 2.0.0 release! Special thanks to @ltfuller for making this trailer!

Follow me on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/DelphaDesign
Early release and test versions will be released my discord server first!
https://discord.gg/R5gRhyF4pU

An alternative story based on Monty Oum & Rooster Teeth's web series RWBY.
Ruby And Weiss travel the world to save Remnant from GRIMM and other evils.

* Play as Team RWBY Each with drastically different play styles.
* Fight a large variety of Grimm and other enemies.
* Kick Roman's, Neo's, Cinder's and more butt (or get kicked depending on skill)
* Discover over the top customizations to Crescent Rose
* Original Story, Art, Music, and now even Voice Overs!
* Battle large Nevermores,  Deathstalkers, Lancers, Paladins, and other boss battles!
* Comedic antics, subtle references to canon show, & whiterose.  
* A complete revamp of the Games UI
* You can play as Penny! 
* ...And much more!


2.0.0 Is out NOW!

Find more and previous releases of the game here:
https://ishmaru.itch.io/rwby
https://gamejolt.com/games/rwby/660552

Voice Credits:
Ruby: Avery Marie
Weiss: Silent Wisteria
Blake: Ruko Ruby
Yang: Zippy

#RWBY #fangame #madewithfusion #saveRWBY #RWBYFangame
